item.title: What's new in C# 8? with Jason Bock
item.description: C# is an open-source, mature object oriented language, used by millions of .NET developers, yet its evolution is still underway. In this session, we’ll cover the latest features that have been added to C#8 and how they work in detail so you’ll know when to use them effectively in your new .NET projects. You’ll also see the direction C# may be going with future versions of C#.
